body.name: Eterbiz Under Cabinet Lights, USB-C Rechargeable, Motion Sensor, Dimmable 3000K/4000K/6000K, LED Under Counter Closet Lighting, Magnetic Stick-on Wireless Closet Kitchen Lights for Christmas Gift
body.stockDetail: Only 20 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 22 hrs 31 mins
features: Enhanced Motion Detection: Equipped with 80 LED lamp beads, a wide 120° motion range (16.4-19.6ft) and 2 sensing modes. Eterbiz motion sensor under cabinet lights react precisely to your movement, providing seamless illumination in closets, kitchens, and bedrooms.

Customizable Ambiance: Eterbiz motion sensor under cabinet lights offer dynamic lighting solutions with 3 dimmable colors (3000K/4000K/6000K) and 10 brightness levels, providing customizable ambiance for various spaces. Note: To ensure that the light has sufficient brightness, please fully charge it before use.

Wireless Installation: Experience wireless easy installation with magnetic attachment, srew-in or stick-on installation, package including all necessary accessories for quick setup - LED under cabinet lights; remote; USB type-C charging cable; magnetic base; stickers and srew pack.

Enhanced Functionality: With timer settings and memory function, they're tailored to your convenience. Magnetic base offers adjustable lighting angle and easy removal. Beyond motion-sensing, these lights serve as emergency or night lights, adapting to your needs.

Effortless Recharging: Say goodbye to disposable batteries. With USB-C rechargeability, you can conveniently power up your lights, diversified charging methods. LED lights and motion function help you save energy, reduce charging times.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Set Your Mood The under cabinet light has a memory function, the light will turn on in the mode you last set: light color (3000K/4000K/600K) and brightness level. Convenient for Life This wireless remote light offers an automatic light switch off so it can also be used as a night light. Magnet-attached base can be easily removed. Come with All Accessories The package includes everything: under cabinet light, remote, charging cable, magnetic base, manual, stickers and screws offers 2 installation ways. Rechargeable Wireless LED Under counter light kitchen are rechargeable, built-in protection chip for battery overcharge and over-discharge problems.

Colors 3000K/4000K/6000K Brightness 10% - 100% 10 Steps Brightness Dimmable Number Of Lamp Beads 80 LED Rechargeable Method: USB-C (included) Usage Scenarios Emergency Light, Night Light, Desk Light, Camping Light, Etc.

Perfect for Closet Kitchen Bedroom UNDER CABINET LIGHT REMOTE INSTRUTIONS 3000K/4000K/6000K options.10% - 100% brightness dimmable.Timer setting and memory function.Two motion sensing mode.Two wireless installation: srew-in or stick-on.

Where can I use Eterbiz cabinet lights? You can use the under cabinet light in the kitchen, living room, hallway, garage, bedroom and so on; can also be used in the wardrobe, staircase, bedside lamp as a night light. Is it a wireless installation? For wireless mounting, the package is supplied with stickers and screw packs, so you have two mounting options to choose from. Magnetic base allows you to take down your light whenever you want for charging/emergencies, etc. How motion sensor mode works? Motion Range: 16.4ft - 19.6ft, 120°, auto off 20s if no motion is detected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fine lights used in attic and crawl space

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Holding a charge, excellent lighting, lots of lighting options
reviews.reviewText: I have tested a lot of these types of under counter lighting units and this one definitely rises to the top of the best list.PROS: after moving the mounting location around quite a bit (using the very strong, very cool looking magnetic mounting option included), I've settled on the outside of the lower drawer of my oven so as to light the flooring in my small kitchen. I'm super impressed with how strong the magnetic mount is.I also particularly like having a remote control to easily not only make adjustments to all lighting features but also includes a timer option (15 min, 30 min, 60 min). Given where I've opted to place this light, the remote is super handy as I don't have to physically have the light in hand to make changes. The three light modes (blue-ish, white and "yellow") combined with the brightness and trigger options make this a stand out under counter light. Each light option is bright and clear and the range from brightest to lightest is noticeable and helpful for all types of situations.I can absolutely see the benefit of the "day motion" feature although I don't use it as such - I've set it for "night motion" and it hasn't failed me in any way, shape or form. It's holding a charge very well, the motion sensor range is spot on (not overly nor under sensitive), and the light responds well to the remote from quite a distance.CONS: only one - and this is purely an aesthetic "me thing" - the total length of the light is about 16" and 3" of that is dedicated to, I presume, the mechanisms, housed in a silver band (i.e. does not light up). When you mount the light and center it over the magnetic mounting piece and turn the light on, the light is not centered - it's off because of this 3" portion that's not lit. If you care about this detail: you have to either mount it so the entire 16" unit is centered to the eye (when NOT lit) OR mount it off center so that when lit, the lighted portion is centered. This drove me absolutely crazy because neither is ideal, which is why I opted to place this in a location where you don't notice it when it's not on - you only see the perfectly centered lighting when it's on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars More versatile than most, works well
reviews.reviewText: There are a lot of under counter motion sensor lights out there, but this one is more versatile than most and it works really well. First of all, it has a remote, which isn’t usually the case. Next, it’s round rather than flat. Then it has a magnetic piece that attaches to it and is shaped so that you’re able to turn the light around to face different directions while it’s still attached to the magnetic piece as it turns. For example, if it’s under the cabinet and facing outward to give light as you walk into the room and you decide to walk to the counter and do something, and it’s shining right in your eyes, then you just reach over and turn it so that it adjusts the light downward out of your eyes and onto what you’re doing on the counter in front of you. That’s a really nice feature that’s unique. You can attach it to something metal using the magnet or use the sticky patch on the bottom and attach it to other surfaces. I like this one better than others I have. I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not a light saber, but a very good LED
reviews.reviewText: I have enjoyed a similar LED product and this "light saber" as I refer to it is a good small package of rechargeable, portable LED magic. Lights with magnets, what a concept. Recommended

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Quickly became a disappointment....
reviews.reviewText: I was really happy with this product when I first set it up. Immediately, the light would come on and I tested the different shades and brightness. It worked great. I had the motion sensor turned on and would work nicely. I liked how it was magnetic so you could walk around with the saber.However, within a day or two, this quickly turned around. It stopped working, so I assumed the battery was dead. After a full charge and set back up, it wouldn't work. The sensor turned on randomly, but not when I would try to trigger it, and the remote stopped working completely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps us from going blind when Mother Nature calls in the middle of the night
reviews.reviewText: I got this because every time I would get up to go to the bathroom in the middle of the night, I would fear turning on the light because it would feel like the lights would bounce off of everything and be brighter than the sun.So when I got this I was very excited and found out that it has a magnetic mount! It also came with a remote which was very necessary because I have a cat that would absolutely set off the motion sensor nonstop if I were to keep it on. So I set it up and put it on the lowest level of light that I could and put it on a towel rod that wasn't being used. Lo and behold Mother Nature called again in the middle of the night and I walked into the bathroom and used the remote to turn the light on and find that I could see without having to squint and try and navigate the room from memory.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Battery Doesn't last too long
reviews.reviewText: I love the look of this light. It is sleek and has a good width to it. It sticks to a magnet which is great because then you can angle it up or down. Very convenient. The light is bright and adjustable on the type of white. I love the more warm white so this is great. I will say, the battery doesnt last long when its set on motion detection. I probably got 4 days worth and then it started flashing for about a day and then died. So I am taking a star off for this but if the battery lasted longer, it would be a 5 star!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this light to replace my old under cabinet plug in one, my husband said I had too many wires😕 so I got this one. It was easy to install. I don't use the motion sensor much but it works well. I like that I can change the temperature and brightness, it can get very bright, depending on the task. To be able to move the direction of the light is another great thing. Is easy to take the light off the magnet if you need it somewhere else. The remote is a bonus but is good to have the button on the light itself, not all of them do. If you lose the remote you can still use the light. Is a good light.
